segments.advisor_message: So, can you tell me a bit about what you do for work? I mean, your job can really influence your investments, you know?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah, yeah! I'm actually, um, I work in marketing, right? Like, I'm a manager at this ad agency, and uh, yeah, I handle like a lot of accounts. It’s pretty busy, but I love it. Like, I was thinking of putting some of my savings into an ISA, um, just makes sense with my current income, right?
